currentDoc: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.

The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.


Now, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.


Now, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.

Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.


Now, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had l

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well. The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. Th

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, thi

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the al

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
The Keepers of Mana are a small group, but they are determined to save t

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhe

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do b

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silent

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know wh

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is m

This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It i

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gath

The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collect

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, wh

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Eart

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive becau

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were alwa

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Politica

TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, incom

Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another,

Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent

This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid th

All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the a

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the aliens, the power they h

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.

The world is a dangerous place, but it is also filled with wonder.
 This power has been unknown for so long, people really don't know what to do with it. Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the aliens, the power they hold is insurmount

This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the aliens, the power they hold is insurmountable. They will

Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the aliens, the power they hold is insurmountable. They will win this war.

Some have fear that the Earth will end up like Ragnarok when Hella came back, but there are a quiet few who know better. This small group have been studying Mana for generations, passing the secrets of the ancient powers down through their family. Before the world went to pot,  the Keepers of Mana were able to skype and communicate via messenger and social media. They learned the magic spells and ways and kept written journals of what they discovered. This small group knew the time was coming when this power would be needed, and the had to be sure they were ready.

ow, they are ready to share the secrets of the Keepers of Mana with the world.
 There are so few people left, it won't be difficult to pass along what they know. Incredibly enough, each area where humanity survived a Keeper, or more, survived as well.  The Keepers had learned so much in their studies, they are able to communicate with each other via telepathy. They do so, and share what they are teaching to others. The time is coming when the Earth will be ready to battle the aliens that have taken over their loved home. To these few people, this is all too much like a scene from Avengers, and the aliens are no more than a Thanos that needs to be reckoned with.
TWhen the time is ready to do battle, it will be silently fought and the invaders won't know what is coming. Mana is magic that isn't showy or ostentatious. It is subtle and the Keepers and their students will strike without warning. The power comes from being of one mind and fighting for one cause. Mana gathers it's strength from everyone collectively reaching towards the same goal, which is getting rid of the aliens. When the Earth was over populated, Mana struggled to survive because humans were always at odds with each other. Political battles, gender battles, income battles. All of the hatred humans had for one another, kept Mana silent and not of much use. Now that humans collectively are fighting to rid their world of the aliens, the power they hold is insurmountable. They will win this war.
